results.title: Prognostic value of long-term antidiabetic and antihypertensive therapy in postoperative gastric cancer patients: the FIESTA study
results.text_hl: Cohort studies suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was related to a lower recurrence and higher survival rate of @<m>DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@GC@@@.
